question: Are we allowed to do fireworks?(firecrackers, bottle rockets, etc.)... I have heard that it is haram, is this true?
answer:
QUESTION
Are we allowed to do fireworks?(firecrackers, bottle rockets, etc.)...Â  I have heard that it is haram, is this true?
ANSWER


Share:

It is not permissible to play with fireworks as it is futile activity and wastage of money. Furthermore, it is an action that resembles other religious groups which is prohibited. Rasulullah () said "whoever imitates a nation is from amongst them".

And Allah Knows Best

Muhammed Zakariyya Desai
